markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Warg](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3230)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Wargs hunt in packs like [wolves](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=485), but their penchant for taunting victims makes them easy to distinguish from their cousins. [Orcs](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=454) and [hobgoblins](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=430) frequently recruit wargs. Most wargs are amenable to this arrangement, but if food should run out, wargs are more than willing to integrate goblinoid flesh into their diet.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Warg](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3230)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Beast" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=547" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 341 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +8; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=74) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Goblin](/Languages.aspx?ID=6), [Orcish](/Languages.aspx?ID=9)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +6, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +3

**Con** +3

**Int** -1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +6 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 36

</row>

**Avenging Bite** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature within reach of the warg's jaws attacks one of the warg's allies; **Effect** The warg makes a jaws Strike against the triggering creature.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +11,
**Damage** 1d8+4 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=45)

**Pack Attack**   The warg's Strikes deal 1d4 extra damage to creatures within the reach of at least two of the warg's allies.

**[Swallow Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=77)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) Small, 1d6+2 bludgeoning, Rupture 9

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-482" />
name: Warg
